name: MCT_Register_Facilities
title: MCT $register-facilities operation
description: This operation is used to register facilities as a FHIR Location or Organization resource with contained FHIR Endpoint resources. If the facility already exists, it will be updated.

parameter.name: locations
parameter.documentation: The [Location](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/location.html) resources to be registered with the service.

parameter.name: organization
parameter.documentation: The [Organization](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/organization.html) resource to be registered with the service.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: This operation returns an [OperationOutcome](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/operationoutcome.html) resource detailing either the success or error(s) in the `issue.diagnostic` element.
